TextView.android:text:
Noterr - get Organised
 Go to Calendar or Notes or ToDo right from the Home Screen by clicking on the Menu at the top Left.
 Calendar:
 1.Create events through the floater button
 2.View the notes,ToDos created on a particular day or week or month by clicking on the date from the calendar.
 3.Navigate to the particular Note or a ToDo from the calendar.
 4.Get reminders for the events created.
 
 Notes:
 1.Create notes by clicking the floater button in the Notes home screen.
 2.You can choose colours for the background for your notes
 3.You can attach Images through camera or from gallery to the notes.
 4.You can attach audio notes aswell and view all the attachments by clicking on the attachments option from the action bar.
 5.You can share the notes as a text file to your friends through WhatsApp, E-mail or any other medium.

 2.You can set the priority for the Items.
 3.You can mark the items when they are completed.
